**Main Help Message**
ðŸ”³ - Main page
ðŸ˜† - Fun
ðŸ“· - Image
âœ¨ - Others
ðŸ”¨ - Moderation
For navigating trought bot commands use the reactions below.You have 20seconds to react
If you are unable to go to next page please remove your reaction if you want to go to next page
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**Main Help Message**
For navigating trought bot commands use the reactions below.
ðŸ”³ - This page
ðŸ˜† - Fun
ðŸ“· - Image
âœ¨ - Miscellaneous
ðŸ”¨ - Moderation
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**ðŸ˜† - Fun**
***
!!slap [@user]           Slaps the mentioned user
!!flipCoin               Returns "Heads" or "Tails"
!!genNumber [min] [max]  Returns a random number
!!gold                   Display's the user's gold
!!gamble                 The user randomly gains or loses some gold
!!kill                   To kill any user
!!steal [@user]          To steal the user gold
!!rps                     Play rock paper scissiors
!!marry [@user]          Marry with the mentioned user
!!divorce                Divorce with your partner
!!marriage               Check your marriage status  
!!lovecalc               Check love calc between two users                    
***
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**ðŸ“· - Image**
***!!avatarhelp               Lists available commands
!!getavatar          Sends the user's avatar image
!!getusercard        Sends avatar with username on it
!!getimage [url]     Sends the image from the URL
!!invertimage [url]  Inverts the image linked in the URL
!!rotateimage [url]  Rotates the image 120 degrees
!!resizeimage [url]  Shrinks the image by 50%***
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**âœ¨ - Miscellaneous**
***!!funembed          For fun commands list
!!infoembed          For info about the server           
!!farmembed          Farming commands :)
!!moderationembe     Moderation commands
!!levelembed         Level commands
!!imageembed         Get images/avtar
!!randompassword     Send you a random password on dm
!!invite             Send you invite link for bot
***
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**ðŸ”¨ - Moderation**
***!!help                      Lists available commands
!!kick [@user] [reason]     Kicks the mentioned user
!!ban [@user] [reason]      Bans the mentioned user
!!mute [@user]              Mutes the mentioned user
!!unmute [@user]            Unmutes the mentioned user
!!deletechannel [#channel]  Deletes the mentioned channel
!deletrole [#role]           Deletes the mentioned role
!!setmod [@user]             Set moderator in your server
!!tempban                    Temporary ban a member
!!lock-unlock                Temprorary lock the channel
!!warn                       Warn a member
!!warnings                   Check a user warnings
!!clearnwanings              Clear a user warnings***
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
Wheat Crops - 1 resource p/ msg - 5,000 GCA Coins
Corn Crops - 2 resources p/ msg - 10,000 GCA Coins
Potato Crops - 5 resources p/ msg - 20,000 GCA Coins
Sugarcane Crops - 10 resources p/ msg - 50,000 GCA Coins
Carrot Crops - 20 resources p/ msg - 100,000 GCA Coins
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
5x Wheat = Bread
10x Corn = Bag of popcorn
20x Potato = Bag of potato's
50x Sugarcane = 1Kg sugar
100x Carrot = Carrot soup
5x Wheat + 2x Pig meat = Sandwhich
10x Corn + 10x Sugarcane = Sweet popcorn
20x Potato + 20x Carrot = Vegetable soup
actions.name: Add Embed Field

${server.tag}make bread - aliases: b
${server.tag}make popcorn - aliases: p
${server.tag}make potatos - aliases: po
${server.tag}make sugar - aliases: s
${server.tag}make carrotsoup - aliases: cs
${server.tag}make sandwhich - aliases: sw
${server.tag}make sweetpopcorn - aliases: sp
${server.tag}make vegetablesoup - aliases: vs

actions.message:
***!!funembed         For fun commands list
!!infoembed           For info about the server           
!!farmembed           Farming commands :)
!!moderationembed     Moderation commands
!!levelembed          Level commands
!!imageembed          Get images/avtar***
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
***
!!slap [@user]           Slaps the mentioned user
!!flipCoin               Returns "Heads" or "Tails"
!!genNumber [min] [max]  Returns a random number
!!gold                   Display's the user's gold
!!gamble                 The user randomly gains or loses some gold
!!kill                   To kill any user
!!steal [@user]          To steal the user gold
!!rps                     Play rock paper scissiors
!!marry [@user]          Marry with the mentioned user
!!divorce                Divorce with your partner
!!marriage               Check your marriage status  
!!lovecalc               Check love calc between two users                    
***
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
***
!!sendEmbed              Sends an embed message
!!userInfo               Displays the user's information
!!channelInfo            Displays the channel's information
!!roleInfo [role-name]   Displays info for the role
!!afk [reason]           Set you afk
!!setupwelcome           Send message when new user join***
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
***!!avatarhelp               Lists available commands
!!getavatar          Sends the user's avatar image
!!getusercard        Sends avatar with username on it
!!getimage [url]     Sends the image from the URL
!!invertimage [url]  Inverts the image linked in the URL
!!rotateimage [url]  Rotates the image 120 degrees
!!resizeimage [url]  Shrinks the image by 50%***

this.callNextAction(cache);
actions.name: Run Script

actions.message:
- Deathbattle Settings Help -
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings help` - Displays this help message with command information and usage
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings add` - Starts a prompt where you can add your own events/actions onto the current deathbattle events/actions
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings list` - Displays a lsit of deathbattle events/actions
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings remove {event/action}` - Removes a certain action from the deathbattle events/actions
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings restore` - Restores the default deathbattle events/actions
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings info [action/event]` - Shows info for provided action/event
